import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Users, MapPin, Lightbulb, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, Globe, Heart, Zap, Sparkles, Star, Shield, Rocket } from 'lucide-react'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Location-Based Problems', description: 'Post and discover problems in your local area with precise location mapping and GPS coordinates.', color: 'from-blue-500 to-blue-600' }, { icon: , title: 'Community Solutions', description: 'Get creative solutions from community members who understand your local context and challenges.', color: 'from-yellow-500 to-orange-500' }, { icon: , title: 'Collaborative Platform', description: 'Work together with neighbors to solve common problems and improve your community.', color: 'from-green-500 to-green-600' }, { icon: , title: 'Verified Solutions', description: 'Upvote and verify solutions that actually work in real-world scenarios.', color: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-600' } ]; const stats = [ { label: 'Problems Solved', value: '1,200+', icon: }, { label: 'Active Users', value: '5,000+', icon: }, { label: 'Cities Covered', value: '150+', icon: }, { label: 'Success Rate', value: '85%', icon: } ]; const steps = [ { number: '01', title: 'Post a Problem', description: 'Share a problem you\'ve noticed in your community with photos and location details.', icon: }, { number: '02', title: 'Get Solutions', description: 'Community members propose creative solutions and share their expertise.', icon: }, { number: '03', title: 'Take Action', description: 'Collaborate with others to implement the best solutions and track progress.', icon: } ]; return (
